imdb.title: Nokemono-tachi no Yoru
imdb.plot: Wisteria is an orphan girl living in a corner of the British Empire at the end of the 19th century. Her life is desolate and bleak, until she encounters Malbus, a powerful but equally lonely immortal being with a furry appearance,...

episodes.title: Let's Be Alone Together
episodes.plot: Wisteria meets Marbas and forms a contract with him in Victorian England.

episodes.title: Encounter
episodes.plot: Wisteria and Marbas' pact is formed; they meet with Diana Blackbell; Wisteria and her brother are reunited.

episodes.title: Riverside Murder
episodes.plot: Wisteria and Marbas meet Harriet and her demonic familiar Maury, but Marbas knows the truth about Harriet that is a secret.

episodes.title: Snowbound Manor
episodes.plot: Wisteria is unconscious in the snow and Marbas takes her to the Blackbell Manor where Diana and Naberius reside.

episodes.title: Confronting Calamity
episodes.plot: Diana and Naberius are preparing for a battle between the commander of the sword cross and his army with the assistance of Wisteria and Marbas.

episodes.title: Guiding Light
episodes.plot: After Naberius breaks off his collar and becomes a hell hound avenging the supposed death of Diana. Diana turns out to be alive and she is the only key to saving Naberius from himself.

episodes.title: The Echo of Gunfire and the Rise of the Curtain
episodes.plot: Luther Roosevelt wages a war for fun with his demons, Dantalion and Sitri. Diana and Wisteria are having a picnic with Marbas and Naberius as Sitri arrives to tell about the fate of her brother Snow.

episodes.title: Something in the Rainy Night
episodes.plot: As Marbas and Wisteria make it back to London, Sitri is now jealous of their relationship that he decides to go on the full offense.

episodes.title: Bullfight
episodes.plot: As Marbas and Wisteria travel to London, they go back to the orphanage where it all started. They later meet with Dantalion.
